Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory405.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "This isn't ending any time soon.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The two of you take down another wave of Corrupted, and Vera's frame is overheating from the continuous intense fights."}
{2: 'Get indoors.', 3: '8'}
{3: 'Vera immediately understands what you mean. She picks you up and carries you over her shoulder, leaping into a building.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory417.jpg'}
{3: 'The Corrupted pass by the building, unable to detect your signals.'}

{3: 'As you have guessed, almost all buildings here are covered with radiation-absorbent material and built with special substances that isolate most usual signals. They are nearly invisible to a machine\'s "eyes."'}
{3: 'Having gone through this immediate danger, Vera relaxes her tense self and sits down, leaning on the wall.'}
{3: 'There is a deep cut on her arm, vital fluid slowly dripping out from the wound. She got it earlier protecting you.'}
{3: 'She keeps saying she does not care for your safety, and yet you are unharmed, save for being exhausted from the difficult journey—she has kept you protected.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "An apology that doesn't help our current situation means it's only to make you feel better.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Do you think I look "okay"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Now shush and let me cool down.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She leans on the wall, her artificial skin starting to turn red.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before you say anything, Vera gives you a stare.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "If you ask me if I'm feeling alright again, I promise you I'll throw you into the ocean.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You remain silent for a long time.'}
{3: 'Having cooled her frame a bit, Vera takes a deep breath and starts treating her wound.'}
{3: "Unlike humans, most of Constructs' wounds are not lethal. But also unlike humans, their wounds do not heal themselves."}
{2: 'Do you need my help?', 3: '34', 4: 'You look like an expert.', 5: '36'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "No. You'd make it worse.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Ha, you have no idea what I used to do.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having said that, it does not seem like she is going to elaborate.'}
{3: 'Vera quickly stops the "bleeding," and you are surprised to find her technique no less delicate and skilled than Liv\'s.'}
{3: 'She fixes herself in no time.'}
{2: 'I can help if you need me.', 3: '44'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: '...Is the true measure of a Chief being relentless or having incredibly thick skin?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She looks at you, and this time she speaks unprompted.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I just think that everything we're doing now is stupid and meaningless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'The Parliament... Kurono... and this mission are all stupid to their core.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'All those calculated men are so damn stupid. They will not stop fighting each other even when everything is at stake.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I am stupid too for telling you this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You think this mission is pointless.', 3: '53', 4: 'You are angry.', 5: '59'}
{3: 'Vera looks up.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What do you think the point is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you understand the Parliament and Kurono enough, you will understand why they are all dancing around you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Kurono wants to lock you up for conspiring with the enemy. The Parliament wants you to sacrifice everything for the fate of humanity.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "They're both trying to rob you and bleed you dry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'One of them is blatant with their intentions, the other one decorates it with righteous causes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera looks up.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Of course I'm angry. Not just at all of these—I'm angry at myself for having to do it anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Has Gray Raven been through so little, or are you just so damn naive?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Everyone knows the Punishing Virus comes from within the zero-point reactor. We're already paying the price, and look where we are.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "How ironic to have us investigate a place like this. Don't they know how the world ended? Do they want a sequel already?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She closes her eyes.'}
{3: 'The soldiers crying on their death beds, the comrades falling before her eyes... Her memories of the past and their pain flood her mind.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I thought the Parliament would be better than Kurono at the very least. Surprise! They're also morons who tempt fate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Poking at something so dangerous just to counter the opponent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You think we should leave zero-point energy alone?', 3: '71'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I don\'t "think."" I ""know" it for a fact.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Can you deny that it was what started all of this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You cannot refute her words.'}
{3: 'That is a fact like she has said.'}
{3: 'Humans have long died on the road to their ambitions. This city is just a graveyard for their arrogance.'}
